DOC.detailed_description: Galantamine , FDA-approved treatment Alzheimer 's disease , use treat cognitive impairment enhance acetylcholine inhibition enzyme , acetylcholinesterase . We propose open-label pilot feasibility study short-term ( 6 week ) treatment galantamine . Sixteen chronic smoker undergo validated procedure screen new medication . Following initial 4-week drug run-up phase ( 8mg daily galantamine-ER ) , medication dose increase 16 mg daily galantamine-ER fifth sixth week study . At begin Week 6 , smoker receive brief counsel make 7-day quit attempt . Following completion study , participant offer standard smoke cessation treatment . Subjects perform work memory task ( Visual/Spatial N-Back ) , sustain attention task ( Continuous Performance Task ; CPT ) , recall memory task ( Word Recognition ) , cognitive flexibility task ( Wisconsin Card Sort Test ) , response inhibition task ( Stop Signal Task ) . The primary outcome ability remain abstinent 7-day quit attempt . Secondary outcome include change cognitive performance , adherence , side effect . This pilot study provide information role cholinergic system brief abstinence whether enhance acetylcholine reduces abstinence-induced cognitive symptom promote smoke relapse . Information obtain study may establish cognitive performance measure endophenotypes nicotine dependence .
